description.narrative: The Revised Project Development Objectives are: (i) to improve transport connectivity in DRC; (ii) to restore SNCC's financial and operational viability; and (iii) to strengthen transport SOEs operational performance.

condition.narrative: Covenant related to SCTP dropped

Finance Agreement :FA, Article V, 5.01 | Description :SNCC Subsidiary Agreement has been amended on behalf of the Recipient and theSNCC to reflect this Financing under terms satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :FA, Article V, 5.02 | Description :The amendment to the SNCC Subsidiary Agreement has been duly authorized orratified by the Recipient and the SNCC and is legally binding upon the Recipient and the SNCC in accordance with its terms. | DueDate :

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section I, A.4 | Description :The Recipient shall cause the SNCC to establish by not later thanMarch 31, 2011 and thereafter maintain an Environmental Unit throughout implementation of the Project | Due Date :31-Mar-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section IV, B.1, (b), (ii) | Description :Provide evidence satisfactory to the Association thatSNCC has adopted a legal asset protection plan for its rolling stock | Due Date :30-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section IV, B.2, (iv) | Description :provide evidence satisfactory to the Association that thesalary arrears, departure indemnities and social security pension contributions, and any outstanding RVF social debt of theseretirees have been fully accounted and certified, under terms and conditions satisfactory to the Association, by an independentauditor under terms and conditions satisfactory to the Association.” | Due Date :15-Apr-2011 - Modified in July 2014
Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 1 | Description :Adopt a governance plan | Due Date :15-May-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 1 | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entities torespectively adopt and implement the tailored governance plans | Due Date :30-Jun-2012
Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 13 | Description :Prepare and implement throughout the implementation of the Projectan HIV/AIDS prevention and treatment program | Due Date :31-Dec-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 2 | Description :Hire external financial and procurement auditors for the SNCC, SCTP,RVA, and CVM and an external financial auditor for the CEPTM | Due Date :31-Dec-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 3 | Description :Maintain for the remainder of the implementation the expensesrelated to the PIEs' Board of Directors at or below the rate of 0.5% of the companies' annual turnover | Frequency :Continuous

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 4 | Description :Avoid, throughout the implementation of the Project, taking anyaction or omitting to take any action jeopardizing the financial and operational viability of the Project Implementing Entities |Frequency :Continuous

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 5 | Description :Avoid, throughout the implementation of the Project, entering intoarrangements or contracts that could materially and/or adversely affect the ability of the PIE to perform their obligations |Frequency :Continuous
Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 6 | Description :Enter into a management contract with a private operator | Due Date:31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 7 | Description :The Recipient shall provide monthly until June 30, 2015, US$1.5million to SNCC for the cost of its operations | Frequency :Monthly
Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 8 | Description :Carry out the SNCC Retirement Plan | Due Date :16-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 9 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall cause SNCC to start implementing a plan forthe clearance of SNCC salary arrears and social debt for all its employees and voluntarily departed eligible retirees as ofDecember31, 2013 | Due Date :31-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 9 (b) | Description :The Recipient shall adopt the report prepared by an independentauditor certifying the amount of salary arrears and outstanding social debt owed by SNCC to its employees and retirees | Due Date:31-Jan-2014

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule 2, Section V, 9 | Description :Maintain and carry out the SNCC Stabilization Contract until suchdate as the private operator and the SNCC shall have signed the management contract | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule, Section V, 9 (a) | Description :The Recipient shall cause the SNCC to start implementing by notlater than March 31, 2014, a plan for the clearance of the SNCC salary arrears and social debt, not financed with the financialassistance of the Association, for all its employees and voluntarily departed eligible retirees as of December 31, 2013, underterms satisfactory to the Association | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :FA, Schedule, Section V, 9 (b) | Description :The Recipient shall, by not later than January 31, 2014, or anyother later date agreed with the Association, adopt the report, prepared under terms satisfactory to the Association, by anindependent auditor, hired under terms and qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association, certifying the amount ofsalary arrears and outstanding social debt owed by the SNCC to its employees and voluntarily departed or departing retirees of theSNCC until December 31, 2013, under terms satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :
